segments.text: My attention is drawn to the other side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Two children are engaged in a clandestine operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is balanced precariously on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching high into an open upper cabinet, his arm fully extended.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, I can clearly see a large jar labeled “COOKIE JAR.”
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is delving deep into the jar, no doubt grabbing a handful of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands nearby, her arm outstretched expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly waiting for her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a clever, mischievous plan they've concocted!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look so determined in their quest for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught by the unaware adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene feels like a perfectly choreographed little rebellion.
segments.speaker: PAR
